instructions: Which Side Are You On? Choose either “A” or “B” that most accurately describes you.

options.label: my room has organized drawer and closets. I even try to organize other things around the house.
I like the "lived-in" look. I clean as I see a need and when I have the time.
My desk is usually clean and has everything in place.
I leave my work out on my desk so I can work as I am inspired by ideas.
I like using the "tried and true" method.
I like creating new methods.
I follow directions carefully when I build a model, make a craft, etc.
I like to build a model my way, making my own creation.
I complete one project at a time.
I like to start many different projects, but do not like to finish them.

questions.label: When I am asked to write a report on a subject, I........

options.label: research information, then outline and organize my writing.
work in my own self-inspired direction.

questions.label: When I had to do a project in class, I.....

options.label: used my parents' ideas, a book's illustrated project or modeled another student's project who received an "A+" from my teacher.
loved the challenge, and like a "mad scientist," I produced a unique project.

questions.label: When I am in charge of a big job with many people working, I usually...

options.label: organize, give everyone their responsibilities, make lists, and make sure everyone finishes their part on time.
work at my own pace, let others work on the job as they want. I want to take care of needs/problems as they arise.

questions.label: Which of these activities would you like to do the most?

options.label: planning the details for a trip/project
creating an original art form

questions.label: I hate it when other people.....

options.label: are indecisive about what activities to do when I am with them.
plan activities in step-by-step detail when I am with them.
